## ExportVariablesBody interface

A set of [exported variables](https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos/latest/policies/variables#export) to be reused in other policies.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ExportVariablesBody 
```

## Remarks

Requires the Cerbos policy decision point server to be at least v0.29.
